=== Issues & missing features ===
  * Config and device descriptor request fail if the output buffer is not large enough.

  * Set debug level IOCTL missing.

  * Untested functionality:
    * High speed iso transfers
    * Direct pipe file handles
    * SET_FEATURE
    * CLEAR_FEATURE
    * SET_DESCRIPTOR
    * VENDOR (HostToDevice)

  * Unsupported pipe policies:
    * RESET_PIPE_ON_RESUME
    * AUTO_CLEAR_STALL
    * ALLOW_PARTIAL_READS
    * AUTO_FLUSH
    * RAW_IO
    * RESET_PIPE_ON_RESUME
